DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of sodium carboxymethylcellulose eye drops in the treatment of dry eye after cataract surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Sodium Carboxymethylcellulose for Post Cataract Surgery Dry Eye Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of agerelated cataract in the study eye Scheduled for cataract surgery and lens implant Diagnosis of ocular surface disease or glaucoma Ocular surgery in the past 3 months Wearing a corneal contact lens in the study eye
